body:
Hello, guys. I am Cyneric_, and if you can remember, my old username was a30ngamingz140.

Although I know I've made some friends on the server, sometimes, if my friends aren't online, I feel a bit lost and lonely, so hopefully, this will serve as an opportunity to help fill this emptiness. So, since this an AMA, ask me anything! Just don't make it too personal or irrelevant, please.

Hope to see you all online! :)
body_tagged:

Hope to see you all online! :)
title: Cyneric_'s AMA

replies.body:
Hey!

What is your favourite:
  • Ice cream flavour?
  • movie?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey!

What is your favourite:
  • Ice cream flavour?
  • movie?

replies.body:
Ice cream flavor: Hmm, well, I'm a big Oreo guy, so I'm gonna have to go with Cookies & Cream.

Movie: I'm a really huge cartoon enthusiast, so probably the Spongebob Squarepants Movie (2004). However, there are some other really good ones like Guardians of the Galaxy and my favorite James Bond film so far, Skyfall.

replies.body:
Hey man!

  • What is your favorite sports team?
  • If you had to choose between going to school by flying on a phoenix or a griffin, which one would it be?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey man!

  • What is your favorite sports team?
  • If you had to choose between going to school by flying on a phoenix or a griffin, which one would it be?

replies.body:
Favorite sports team: Baseball is my favorite team sport, so, sorry if you're a Yankees fan, but the Boston Red Sox take the cake for me.

Phoenix or Griffon: I'd have to go with the griffon, only because Greek mythology is my favorite kind of mythology.

Still, I love the Red Sox. Big Papi all the way!

replies.body: Do you think that Vladmir Putin is an alien?
replies.body_tagged: Do you think that Vladmir Putin is an alien?

replies.body: Technically, an alien is anyone who is not a citizen of one's native country. Since my native country is the United States, and Putin's Russian, I gotta say yes. :P

replies.body:
Is it okay if I don't answer some of these questions just because they're a bit personal to me? Sorry. :(

Anyways, I play Minecraft, ofc. xD
No, I don't play Honorbound, unfortunately.
I live in Connecticut, United States.
I'm almost done with my high school freshman year (9th grade).
No kidding! :D
(Sorry, I really don't want to reveal my name on the forums, but I'll tell you via /msg ingame.)
